post.body: lmao?
lol thanks I was going to buy one!
not me!
haha I can change your name anytime.
best map I ever made used string tape and paper but took up 4 large walls and is hard to carry around.
haha, right now I'm using mind mapping - its too simple but 2 pple can work at same time
wow! Thanks for the lmao.
what are you using to make the map? I make them all the time.
you better send updates during the game
yes thats a completely legitimate reason to be late.
not watching the blago press conference?
thanks for that analog.
really? do it fast.
planning some ausgang events for next year - are u in chicago?
Anything coming up in Chicago?
lovin' my job.
waiting for @mrskin to tell me who he'll pay to spend the night with http://tinyurl.com/7lgfps
had breakfast at The Ohio House in chi-town. 6 pieces of bacon w/ my eggs.
playing with the flip mineo to show @mrskin how to use it later. Behind the scenes vids from skin central. haha
Back at skin central. The slaw went bad but there are chocolate coins of all nations in the kitchen.
